Jogo sensacional. Simples e objetivo. Tudo é muito rápido. E isso faz a diferença no CS!
Very Good Video Game, the best pc shooter of recent days!

Super fun game to chill out with some mates with. Definitely improved over the years with their gradual added content. Personally coming back after having the funds to build a better PC than an old HP laptop, years later, I found the game more enjoyable. Even with the low hours I've got on this account. 

All in all, super fun and enjoyable for a few hours a day, and to have chill times with a few mates. Highly recommend
I love this game, and I spent a lot of money on it, but I don't know why my trust factor is so bad. Other than that, great game!
this is a bad game do not play

Es el mítico counter del 1.6 que se jugaba con los compas del barrio. Solo que remasterizado, con gráficas acorde al año de salida y una jugabilidad más definida. El juego tiene pros y contras, como el anticheat, los hackers, los trolls, etc. Lo que me encanta del juego es que por cada hora que vayas sumando, vas mejorando, tratas de mejorar, ves la forma de mejorar. Las skins están buenas aunque no te dan skills; pero, al menos morirás con dignidad. Ahora en septiembre del 2020 el juego sigue siendo bueno para mí, sin embargo, hay mucho por mejorar. Recomendado para jugar con amigos, ya sea competitivamente o simplemente por huevear.
Ur gonna get cancer from this game
Demasiado vicioso y divertido con los panas

This game is nothing short of an epic.  11 years later, and still kicking with thousands of people online to play with.  Valve and Counter Strike killing it since the '90s, and they just keep improving with this simple skill based concept.  Always a blast and a good way to hang out with some distant friends online too.  It's impossible to say "timeless" in the age of constantly improving technology, but I wouldn't be surprised if we're still playing this in another 11 years.
